next.description: Next priority after now is complete

dashboard-v4-redesign.title: Dashboard v4 - Data-Dense Redesign
dashboard-v4-redesign.description: Complete redesign of Fleet Dashboard from card-based to data-dense, table-driven layout. Optimized for half-screen use alongside CLI. Removes inaccurate metrics (limits/costs), adds CLI/AUTO session types, moves health/confidence to task-level only, adds prediction calculations.
acceptance: 2-panel layout (sessions + content) renders at full and half-screen
Top bar shows: projects, sessions, tasks (X/Y), agents/sub-agents
Sessions grouped by project with CLI/AUTO badges
Prediction chips show messages remaining
5 tabs functional: Overview, Tasks, Hierarchy, Details, Logs
Health/Confidence only on tasks (not sessions)
Hierarchy tab shows agent tree with summary
+Session launches new CLI in selected project
Keyboard nav: j/k navigate, 1-5 tabs, n launcher
All E2E tests pass
dashboard-v4-redesign.completionNotes: All 6 subtasks complete. 2-panel layout, 5 tabs, CLI/AUTO badges, session launcher, keyboard nav. 29 E2E tests passing.

dashboard-v4-layout.title: Phase 1: Core Layout & CSS
dashboard-v4-layout.description: Replace current card-based layout with 2-panel data-dense design. Create new CSS variables, implement top bar with simplified metrics, add responsive breakpoints.
acceptance: New CSS variables matching v4 design
Top bar with projects/sessions/tasks/agents counts
2-panel layout (left: sessions, right: content)
Responsive breakpoints for narrow screens
Proper scrolling in each panel

dashboard-v4-sessions.title: Phase 2: Session Panel
dashboard-v4-sessions.description: Rebuild session list with project grouping, CLI/AUTO type badges, context %, and prediction chips. Remove health/confidence from session level.
acceptance: Sessions grouped by project (collapsible)
CLI/AUTO session type badge on each session
Context %, phase, prediction chip displayed
No health/confidence on session items
Session selection highlighting works

dashboard-v4-tabs.title: Phase 3: Tab System
dashboard-v4-tabs.description: Implement 5-tab content area: Overview (stats, predictions, current task), Tasks (active, ready, completed), Hierarchy (agent tree), Details (session info), Logs (activity stream).
acceptance: Overview tab with stats grid and predictions
Tasks tab with active/ready/completed sections
Hierarchy tab with agent tree and summary
Details tab with full session metadata
Logs tab with color-coded activity stream
Tab switching works via click and keyboard (1-5)

dashboard-v4-backend.title: Phase 4: Backend Updates
dashboard-v4-backend.description: Add sessionType (cli/autonomous) to API responses, add prediction calculations (messagesRemaining, timeToFull), add hierarchy summary to /api/agent-pool/status.
acceptance: sessionType field in /api/sessions/summary and /api/overview
Prediction calculations in session data
Health/confidence only on task objects
Hierarchy summary in /api/agent-pool/status

dashboard-v4-launcher.title: Phase 5: +Session Launcher
dashboard-v4-launcher.description: Create /api/sessions/launch endpoint to spawn new Claude Code CLI. Implement project picker modal. Launch with --dangerously-skip-permissions.
acceptance: /api/sessions/launch endpoint works
Project picker modal shows known projects
Launches claude --dangerously-skip-permissions in new terminal
Keyboard shortcut 'n' opens modal

dashboard-v4-testing.title: Phase 6: Testing & Polish
dashboard-v4-testing.description: Update E2E tests for new layout. Test keyboard navigation, responsive behavior, performance. Cross-browser testing.
acceptance: E2E tests updated for new layout
Keyboard nav tested (j/k, 1-5, n)
Responsive behavior verified at various widths
Performance <500ms load, <200ms tab switch
Works in Chrome, Firefox, Edge

add-model-pricing.title: Add GPT-5.2 and Gemini 3 Pricing
add-model-pricing.description: Add pricing configuration for GPT-5.2 and Gemini 3 models to the cost calculator and fix hardcoded Claude defaults
acceptance: GPT-5.2 pricing added
Gemini 3 pricing added
Claude defaults configurable
Tests pass

dashboard-ux-redesign.title: Dashboard Fleet Management Redesign
dashboard-ux-redesign.description: Redesign dashboard for Fleet Management mode (5+ concurrent sessions). Add agent lineage visibility, countdown timers for token/rate limits, smart defaults for metric surfacing, and alert system with banner+sound+toast. Based on agent swarm analysis and user requirements.
acceptance: Fleet overview shows all projects/sessions at a glance
5-hour countdown timer with remaining time visible
Session context countdown shows time until auto-compact
Agent lineage tree shows full parent-child delegation hierarchy
Alert banner with sound for critical alerts (token exhaustion, rate limit)
Toast notifications for other events (task claimed, session started)
Smart defaults auto-surface relevant metrics based on context
New /api/agent-pool/status endpoint returns lineage + metrics
New /api/overview endpoint returns fleet-level aggregates
WebSocket channel /ws/fleet for real-time delegation events
Keyboard navigation (arrows, ESC, number keys)
Performance: overview loads <500ms, drill-downs <200ms
dashboard-ux-redesign.completionNotes: All 5 phases complete: Backend APIs, Fleet header/alerts, Project cards, Agent lineage tree, Keyboard navigation. 14 new E2E tests added.

cli-session-activity-logs.title: CLI Session Activity Logs in Dashboard
cli-session-activity-logs.description: Display tool calls, file edits, and commands for CLI sessions in the dashboard Logs tab. Research complete - PostToolUse hook already writes to tool-audit.jsonl. Need to wire this to dashboard API and UI.
acceptance: API endpoint /api/logs/:sessionId/activity serves tool-audit.jsonl data
Logs tab displays tool calls for CLI sessions (not just 'logs to terminal' message)
Activity entries show: timestamp, tool name, status (success/fail)
Real-time updates via SSE when new tool calls occur
Consistent format between CLI and autonomous session logs
cli-session-activity-logs.completionNotes: Implemented all 4 phases: API endpoint, dashboard UI update, SSE streaming, E2E tests. 9 new tests added.

phase1.title: API Endpoint for Tool Audit Logs
steps: Return parsed JSON array of tool calls

phase2.title: Dashboard Logs Tab Update
steps: Update updateLogsPane() to fetch /api/logs/:sessionId/activity for CLI sessions
Render tool calls in same table format as autonomous logs
Show tool name, status, timestamp columns

phase3.title: Real-time Updates
steps: Enhance PostToolUse hook to emit SSE event after writing to JSONL
Dashboard subscribes for live tool call updates

phase4.title: Testing
steps: Test API returns correct tool audit data
Test dashboard renders logs for CLI sessions

existingInfrastructure: LogStreamer exists for autonomous session logs
SSE infrastructure in place for real-time updates
researchFindings.recommendation: Extend existing LogStreamer pattern for tool-audit.jsonl

dashboard-blocked-tasks-view.title: Show Blocked Tasks and Dependency Graph in Dashboard
dashboard-blocked-tasks-view.description: Dashboard only shows ready/in-progress tasks, hiding blocked tasks completely. Should show blocked tasks with their dependencies so users understand what's preventing progress.
acceptance: Dashboard shows blocked tasks (not just ready/in-progress)
Blocked tasks display what's blocking them (dependency names)
Visual indicator distinguishes blocked vs ready tasks
Optional: Mini dependency graph or tree view
Clicking blocked task shows full dependency chain
Integration with existing task-graph.html visualization

auto-delegation-integration.title: Auto-Delegation Integration - Connect Prompts to DelegationDecider
auto-delegation-integration.description: Bridge the gap between user prompts and the existing DelegationDecider/hierarchy system. Use Claude Code hooks to intercept prompts, analyze complexity, and inject delegation recommendations into conversation context. Enables automatic use of Task tool for complex tasks.
acceptance: Hook runs on every prompt and injects delegation analysis
DelegationDecider accurately identifies complex tasks
User can force/prevent delegation with /delegate and /direct skills
Delegated tasks execute through AgentOrchestrator via Task tool
Dashboard shows delegation activity and progress
All tests pass (160+ new tests)
Documentation complete
Performance targets met (< 200ms hook, < 500ms decision)

dashboard-validation-audit.title: Dashboard Validation Audit - Test All Functions & Reconcile APIs
dashboard-validation-audit.description: Comprehensive audit of the dashboard to identify broken features, test all current functions, and reconcile with backend APIs. Wire in any backend features not yet exposed to the dashboard.
acceptance: All dashboard buttons/actions tested and documented
All API endpoints mapped to dashboard features
Broken features identified and fixed
Missing backend features wired into dashboard
Session management fully functional
Task claiming/releasing works correctly
Real-time updates (SSE) verified
Cost tracking and metrics display correctly
dashboard-validation-audit.completionNotes: Swarm audit completed: 74+ API endpoints mapped, quality circles bug fixed, OTLP→UsageLimitTracker connected, dotenv added

otlp-claude-code-integration.title: Integrate OTLP Telemetry with Claude Code CLI
otlp-claude-code-integration.description: Configure Claude Code CLI to send telemetry metrics to the dashboard's OTLP receiver. Currently the dashboard has OTLP receiver ready (port 4318) but Claude Code CLI needs env vars set in shell profile to send metrics.
acceptance: Claude Code CLI sends telemetry to OTLP endpoint
Dashboard usage display updates from OTLP metrics
Shell profile (.bashrc/.zshrc) updated with required env vars
Documentation updated with setup instructions
Verified metrics flow: Claude CLI → OTLP Receiver → UsageLimitTracker → Dashboard
otlp-claude-code-integration.completionNotes: Fixed OTLP receiver initialization (usageTracker optional), configured Claude Code settings with env vars, tested metrics flow end-to-end, documented in DASHBOARD-FEATURES.md

dashboard-fleet-ui-completion.title: Complete Fleet Management Dashboard UI Features
dashboard-fleet-ui-completion.description: Agent edits for Fleet Lineage panel and Keyboard Navigation failed to apply in Session 72. Need to implement: (1) Project cards HTML container, (2) Fleet Lineage toggle panel with hierarchy visualization, (3) Enhanced keyboard nav (arrow keys, 1-9 project jump, a/l/m toggles).
acceptance: Project cards container (#projectCards) renders in HTML
Fleet Lineage panel toggles with View Lineage button
fetchFleetHierarchy() fetches from /api/agent-pool/status
Arrow keys (up/down) navigate sessions
Number keys 1-9 jump to project cards
Keys a/l/m toggle lineage, logs, mute
All E2E tests pass (dashboard-fleet-ui.e2e.test.js)
dashboard-fleet-ui-completion.completionNotes: Session 72: Added #projectCards container, Fleet Lineage panel (fleetLineageSection), View Lineage button, fetchFleetHierarchy(), updateProjectCards(), renderFleetLineage(), enhanced keyboard nav (arrows, 1-9, a/l/m). All 14 E2E tests + 2507 unit tests pass.
